# The `OpaqueInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

An LLLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> that has no SandboxIR equivalent class gets mapped to an OpaqueInstr. <a href="#details">More...</a>
